channel.title: Got an error, help please

item.title: Got an error, help please
item.dc:creator: @slim_2021 slim_2021
item.description:
@slim_2021 wrote:

ok this is what i added to my commands, i kept the line above and below it

}
else if ((playerRights >= 3) && command.startsWith(“ipban”)) {
try {
int pid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring((command
.indexOf(" “) + 1)));
if (pid < 1) {
sendMessage(“Invalid pid”);
return;
}
client bannedUser = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pid];
if ((bannedUser == null) || (bannedUser.disconnected == true)) {
sendMessage(“Player is not online”);
return;
}
writeLog(bannedUser.connectedFrom, “ipbans”);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = bannedUser.playerName;
yell(bannedUser.playerName
+ " has been ip banned from PyroScape.”);
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Invalid syntax! Usage: ::ipban PID, find pid from ::players”);
e.printStackTrace();
}

if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”)))

And this is my error

client.java:11960: illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

any1 have any idea?
